messages.subject: video game learning
messages.msgSnippet: Hi everyone! I just had to share that my 9ds learned about depreciation on Grand Turismo 3 last night.    Let s see I don t think I had heard of depreciation
messages.messageBody:
Hi everyone!



I just had to share that my 9ds learned about depreciation on Grand Turismo 3 last night. Let's see I don't think I had heard of depreciation until I was in, uh, maybe, college, studying Accounting and Economics! Not too bad for a 9 year old who isn't in school. Love it!





And what's even better is that it was my husband that came to me with this news. Usually its me pointing out how much he learns on these things, aha, I've got him now!



Take Care,

Kelli







---------------------------------
Do you Yahoo!?

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
